Hellplague:
 
Hellplague silently waited.  She did not want to push the issue, it wasn't top priority, bit it would be nice to go and stir things up.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Unicron:

Unicron though about the psoibility to allow that


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Hellplague:
>  
> "It is quiet on the surface.  I fear the Maximals are planning 
something, something that may pose a threat to you, Master," 
Hellplaguesaid," we wish to go down and see how they faired after our 
battle."
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Unicron:
> 
> "So"said a hologram that appeared in the midle of the room "Wht 
bring 
> you here, mny minions?"
> 
> 
> 
> 
>

> wrote:
> > Hellplague/ Malice/ Necross:
> >  
> > Hellplague stepped in after Blacknightmare, and stood by the 
door.  
> She would step further if Unicron wished her to.
> >  
> > Malice finished his drink and left it on the table.  He got up 
and 
> left the room to return to his.  On his way he ran into Necross.  
> Necross gave Malice a distasteful sneer, but said nothing.  Both 
bots 
> went their ways, and Malice returned to his room.
> >  
> > Necross entered the mess hall and ordeed himself a drink.
> > "Those femmes and their new toy... Perhaps Unicron should keep a 
> shorter leash on them."
> >

> and

followed

someone
